segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a disaster with that sink overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, ruining the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, acting like it's all fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's knee-deep in ignorance, foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are raiding the cookie jar without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on an unstable stool, stretching way too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's gross how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, waiting her turn greedily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks pristine, mocking the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing potential slips and falls coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes could shatter, water damage mounting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes me so mad.
segments.speaker: PAR
